narrativeArcs.name: The Money Trail
narrativeArcs.directorObservationSupport: Players spent significant time tracing financial documents, connecting Blake's offshore accounts to Charlie's audit reports
narrativeArcs.summary: Following the $2.3M from Blackwood Corp through shell companies to offshore accounts

narrativeArcs.name: The Audit Cover-up
narrativeArcs.directorObservationSupport: Elena's discovery of Charlie's altered reports created key dramatic moment
narrativeArcs.summary: Charlie's manipulation of audit records to hide irregular transactions

narrativeArcs.name: The Legal Shield
narrativeArcs.directorObservationSupport: Diana's role was mentioned but not deeply investigated by players
narrativeArcs.summary: Diana's potential involvement in backdating legal documents

characterPlacementOpportunities.Blake: Central figure - can feature in money trail and conclusion as the accused
characterPlacementOpportunities.Charlie: Key accomplice - feature in audit cover-up and money trail connection
characterPlacementOpportunities.Diana: Supporting role - legal expertise provided cover for scheme
characterPlacementOpportunities.Elena: Investigator role - her discovery of evidence can be highlighted
characterPlacementOpportunities.Alex: Minor mention - financial advisor context, not directly implicated

heroImageSuggestion.reasoning: Shows the connections between players and evidence that drove the investigation
